name: Heart Realm: Journey to the Blood and Age of the Unknown Darkness
name_original: Heart Realm: Journey to the Blood and Age of the Unknown Darkness
description: You play as the mighty FalconHorn, the last survivor of the Covert Destroyers.  Blind Assassins plan on using their Grim Leaders as sacrifice to the Vampiric Ghost Shooters, but you will put a stop to them in this action/puzzle/driving game.
